AD_Guard.synopsis: Plig stops in between the two goblin pens in front of the altar the goblins have decorated and fires this AD. She fires thes eindividually, musing to herself on patrol.
AD_Guard.how_to_trigger: Plig stops in between the two goblin pens in front of the altar the goblins have decorated and fires this AD. She fires one, walks her patrol and returns, then fires another.

AD_GuardAtGate.synopsis: Plig roars this warning at the player who is in prison and has got too close to the doors.
AD_GuardAtGate.how_to_trigger: Player, while in prison, has approached the cell door while the warrior plig is nearby

AD_Guard_0.speaker: Warrior Plig
AD_Guard_0.text: I'm famished. Maybe the worgs won't notice if I rob a bitta meat...
AD_Guard_0.context: InternalNodeContext: There is a chopping block with wood nearby where meat is on the slab, she is referring to this

AD_Guard_1.speaker: Warrior Plig
AD_Guard_1.text: Good thing we rolled in 'ere. Place is starting to look proper homey.

AD_Guard_2.speaker: Warrior Plig
AD_Guard_2.text: Wish I got a turn at the bear. Lucky.

AD_GuardAtGate_0.speaker: Warrior Plig
AD_GuardAtGate_0.text: Oi, barrel-rat! Back away from the bars or I bite off one of 'em fingers!
AD_GuardAtGate_0.context: NodeContext: Roaring with both anger and delight (she kind wants the player to start some shit as she's eager for action.)
